DataElement.preferredName: Standardized Uptake Value Cervix Uteri Assessment Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the standardized uptake of a positron emission tomography assessment measurement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Standardized Uptake Value Cervix Uteri Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)]._(SER-viks) The lower, narrow end of the uterus that forms a canal between the uterus and vagina._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)].

Concepts.definition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].

Property.preferredDefinition: (SER-viks) The lower, narrow end of the uterus that forms a canal between the uterus and vagina.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The lower part of the uterus occupying the region between the isthmus of the uterus and the vagina. It is divided into supravaginal and vaginal portions.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 7/2010

ValueDomain.preferredName: Standard Uptake Value Positron Emission Tomography Assessment Measurement
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the measurement of the standard uptake value during a PET assessment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: Move to caBIG context as teh preferred Rep class for Measurement

ValueDomain.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 10/2010 sw
